org.jlab.clara.sys

Class CompositionAnalyser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.clara.sys.CompositionAnalyser

  • public class CompositionAnalyser
extends java.lang.Object

    Parser of the composition. One parser for each service. Currently parses a simple composition chain. todo: soon will add parsing of the CLARA condition statement.

    Since:
    5/15/15

      • parse_linked

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> parse_linked(java.lang.String service_name,
                                            java.lang.String composition,
                                            int link_direction)
                                              throws CException

        Parses composition field of the transient data and returns the list of services output linked to this service, i.e. that are getting output data of this service. Attention: service name CAN NOT appear twice in the composition.

        Parameters:
        service_name - the name of the service for which we find input/output links
        composition - the string of the composition
        link_direction - 0 = input-inked, >0 = output-linked
        Returns:
        the list containing names of linked services
        Throws:
        CException

      • is_log_and

        public boolean is_log_and(java.lang.String service_name,
                 java.lang.String composition)

        Check to see in the composition this service is required to logically AND inputs before executing its service

        Parameters:
        service_name - in the composition
        composition - the string of the composition
        Returns:
        true if component name is programmed as "&"
